properties.Opening Hours:
7am to 11pm daily (except maintenance days)
Maintenance Day: 9am to 3pm on the 1st & 3rd Monday of each month (If a maintenance day falls on a public holiday, it will be rescheduled tothe next working day.)
properties.開放時間:
每日上午7時至晚上11時 (定期保養日除外)
定期保養日: 每月第一及第三個星期一上午9時至下午3時 (如該日為公眾假期，保養日則順延至下一個工作日）
